publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-804 Nora Radcliffe: Designation of Nitrate Vulnerable Zones (Scotland) Regulations 2000 (SSI 2000/96)—That the Transport and the Environment Committee recommends that nothing further be done under the Designation of Nitrate Vulnerable Zones (Scotland) Regulations 2000 (SSI 2000/96).

S1M-804 Nora Radcliffe: Designation of Nitrate Vulnerable Zones (Scotland) Regulations 2000 (SSI 2000/96)—That the Transport and the Environment Committee recommends that nothing further be done under the Designation of Nitrate Vulnerable Zones (Scotland) Regulations 2000 (SSI 2000/96). Supported by: Brian Adam*
S1M-804 Designation of Nitrate Vulnerable Zones (Scotland) Regulations 2000 (SSI 2000/96) (lodged on 3 May 2000) Donald Gorrie*
